name: SOMNA
description:
SOMNA is a turn based multiplayer strategy game with a boardgame feel.  Inspired by deck-builders such as Dominion and Eminent Domain, SOMNA attempts to turn the formula on its head by having players collectively build the board state, instead of their individual decks.

There's only one character, known as THE DREAMER, and nobody controls it directly.  Instead, it periodically roams around the board - which represents a dreamscape - interacting with different locations and unlocking powerful effects that can be harnessed by the players.

Beating your opponents requires developing a solid strategy that allows you not only to effectively manipulate the Dreamer's movements, but the Dreamscape itself - all while keeping your opponents' strategy in check.

SOMNA is currently in an early prototyping stage but is fully playable both online and versus a (not so great) bot. 

NOTE: Do not adjust your sets, there's just no sound in the game right now.   Try making whale-sounds while you play for increased immersion.
